subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: juli velazquez
full_text:
--0-1358493866-1196820125=:84419
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Thanks for the validation.   I am using the sweeping band uploading directly into adobe audition 1.5.  I believe its similar to your methods.  I however like to have the audio continually run through the series of questions, due to the fact sometimes they do not answer immediately to the question or more than one voice seems to chime in.
   
  I have also come to discover that sometimes when I am asking a direct question, that prior to me finishing they also answer before I am done.  Which leads me to believe that they somehow know what I am going to ask.
   
  My daughter who is 10 walked into my office yesterday, only to have the unit say "Hi Alexxis".  She is amazed that they in fact knew who she was just by walking into the room and not saying a word.
   
  

bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
          hi,
 
I hear what you hear.
what method are you using ?
 
bruce


    Bruce Halliday 
Paranormal Investigating Team 




    
---------------------------------

Subject: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC

      
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

File : /Ghost's Hacked EVP/missing children..forwhat..i will...thats nice.WMA 
Uploaded by : ghostchasingfool <ghostchasingfool@...> 
Description : Question Will you help in looking for missing children..."For What"..."I Will"..."That's Nice" 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Ghost%27s%20Hacked%20EVP/missing%20children..forwhat..i%20will...thats%20nice.WMA 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:

Regards,

ghostchasingfool <ghostchasingfool@...>
